I hope professor can add some other aspects to the evaluation, such as attendance. Otherwise, the exams are too difficult to me. I like professor because he is kind and full of knowledge, and this course is interesting and valuable.
Tom's class is the best! Beside the context, we also learn a lot interesting facts about the authors.
